name: Penthouse build ideas for Minecraft
description:
This app is for inspirational use and is not related to Minecraft, Mojang or Microsoft.
Penthouses are small but luxurios modern apartments, they are easy to create and look amazing.
Install this game and play all levels to explore and learn to create the most amazing penthouses ever created in Minecraft and MPCE.
Explore amazing penthouses ranging from modern, to traditional and retro themed.
